Title: The Keys to Growing as a Leader This Year with Patrick Lencioni
Description:
It can be so easy to jump headfirst into a new year. You have new goals, new plans and new gym memberships. But is there a step before all of this new activity? Should we take a moment to pause and reflect on the previous year in order to become the leaders we want to be? In this episode of The EntreLeadership Podcast, we sit down with Patrick Lencioni, one of the founders of The Table Group and a pioneer of the organizational health movement. Patrick tells us why it is so important to reflect on the previous year and avoid repeating the same mistakes in the next one. Then in our second segment, George Kamel interviews Dr. John Delony on some tactical strategies for reflection this holiday season.
